Posts.Title: petition the government to continue Kadcyla for breast cancer patients...

Posts.Content: Hi thanks I was wondering about whether to contact breast clinic. I am going to give them a call now.x
Posts.Title: Under-arm pain

Posts.Content: Rang the breast nurse I have got an appointment next Thursday. I have a holiday booked for 3 weeks tomorrow and I think this is what is making me feel a bit insecure as it's in Spain.  Would hate to be in a different country and dealing with something like this.   Will let you know how it goes.
Posts.Title: Under-arm pain

Posts.Content: I don't think I have ever started a discussion before but I do keep up to date on a daily basis through the website, so hi to everyone.  I was diagnosed in October 2013 and completed treatment in November 2014.  I have always had a tender breast bone since treatment  but over the last few days or so I have developed a nagging ache and sore collarbone and also a tender shoulder blade.  I cannot get an appointment with the GP until next week.  Just wondering if anyone has had similar symptoms and what if any treatment they had?  Cheers chance 1960
Posts.Title: Under-arm pain

Posts.Content: Hi Rome, just wondering how long you have been on the Tamoxifen as there are certain drugs that you need to gradually reduce and not just stop taking them.  Maybe call the bcn and see what she says.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen withdrawal

Posts.Content: Hi Carolyn 28 I am going off the original blog but was wondering what your Her+++ diagnosis is.  I have not seen this before and am intrigued to know what it is. Chance1960
Posts.Title: Natural v Chemo

Posts.Content: I had exactly the same thing.  Consultant ordered a head ct scan which came back normal.  Prior to this I had been prescribed the weekly alondronic acid medication.  I stopped taking the tablet because I was having problems with a dry mouth and swallowing the tablet.  It was not long after that the headaches and nausea stopped so I assumed that it was the medication that was most likely the cause of the symptoms.  I am in my 5 year of cancer free.
Posts.Title: CT scan for brain mets
